context.p: To upgrade your version of the for DocBook, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Navigate to your DocBook XSL directory directory and delete the old files (oxygen_custom.xsl, oxygen_custom_html.xsl) and directory (com.oxygenxml.webhelp).
Go to website, download the latest DocBook version of the installation kit, and unzip it in your DocBook XSL directory.
step.stepresult: The DocBook XSL directory should now contain a new subdirectory named com.oxygenxml.webhelp and two new files, oxygen_custom.xsl and oxygen_custom_html.xsl.
